title: Viscosity and Laminar Flow; Poiseuille’s Law
body: A layer of oil $$1.50$$ mm thick is placed between two microscope slides. Researchers find that a force of $$5.5\times{10}^{\left(-4\right)}$$ N is required to glide one over the other at a speed of $$1.00$$ $$\frac{cm}{s}$$ when their contact area is $$6.00$$ $${cm}^2$$.
